text: John Patrick Cuff (June 1864 – September 16, 1916) was a professional baseball player who played catcher in the Major Leagues in 1884 for the Baltimore Monumentals of the Union Association. He continued to play in the minor leagues through 1890. ==External links== Category:1864 births Category:1916 deaths Category:Major League Baseball catchers Category:Baltimore Monumentals players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Bridgeport Giants players Category:Jersey City Skeeters players Category:Long Island A's players Category:Newark Little Giants players Category:Wilkes-Barre Barons (baseball) players Category:Baseball players from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Jersey City, New Jersey
title: John Cuff (baseball)
